title: Supreme Court Squad: Extreme!
description: The animated series that brings your toys to life. Justices John G. Robots, Android Scalia, and Wrath Hover Ginsbot are fighting with the power of the law.
quote: I’m appointed for life… to kick your butt!
altHero: the justices (robot judges) flying through the air
alt1: the justices running and firing weapons
alt2: Justice Wrath Hover Ginsbot flying into the courtroom
alt3: a robot lawyer with his client, a robofrog
alt4: Justices John G. Robots and Android Scalia
